title: Secure User Login
description: As a registered user, I want to log in using my email address and password so that I can securely access my account within 2 seconds.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user is registered, when the user enters a valid email and password and submits the login form, then the system authenticates the user and redirects them to the dashboard.
Given the user enters an invalid email or password, when the user submits the login form, then the system displays a clear authentication error message.
Given the user submits the login form, when authentication is successful, then the system completes the login process within 2 seconds.
nfrs: Security: Passwords shall be transmitted over HTTPS and stored using industry-standard hashing.
Performance: User authentication shall complete within 2 seconds for 95% of requests.
Usability: Error messages shall be clear and understandable to non-technical users.
Availability: The login service shall be available 99.9% of the time.
